string-array.name: description
string-array.item: "just a armut and being an armut does not mean being stupid"
"just a elma and being an armut does not mean being stupid"
"only mahmut and being an armut does not mean being stupidAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA"

resources.string: We are a group of 6 developers. Our aim is to increase the connection among bilkenters by making their communicartion easier. Due to this purpose, we are hoping to make a platform which will help bilkenters to raise awarenessabout their problems in Bilkent University and announce about Bilkent, whatever they want to ask or announce.
